synopsis.text: Hoichiro Ohma works an ordinary office job, but secretly leads a double life as the Judge of Darkness. When someone dies an unjust death, whether by murder or suicide, their restless spirit can appeal to the dark spirit world for justice. Hoichiro is tasked with investigating these cases and passing judgment on the living criminals who would otherwise go free. Guiding him is the Laws of Darkness recorded in a gruesome book of human skin. With the help of his parrot familiar, Hoichiro unravels the truth behind a corporate executive seemingly involved in embezzlement and murder. However, he soon discovers the corruption runs deeper, implicating more and more people up the corporate ladder in foul play. Though the justice system of the living world fails, the laws of the dead are uncompromising. In the dark underbelly of the spirit world, even the deceased have rights that demand upholding.
